title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 21.10 - Leave for civil service examinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 21.10 - Leave for civil service examinations

State Regulations

Employees shall be allowed leave with pay to take New York

State Civil Service examinations at the appropriate center, provided that due
notice is given by the employee to the appointing authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
21.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
